title: My Pixel3a switched-off and won't turn on issue
content:
I am from India, I am not able use my pixel 3a from June 8th onwards due to the switched off issue.
My battery drained and switched off the phone automatically and now battery completely drained and when I am trying to charge my phone, device not at all charging. This is the big issue with my phone.

And #GoogleSupport team is telling that, due to COVID 19 no service centres opened in India. And I am with no phone because of Google customer. Please anyone from Google support team help in resolving this issue.

Here, I am attaching my case id that has been registered one month back. Still no reply
